snippet: President Obama is expected to nominate Tom Wheeler, who has been a lobbyist and venture capitalist in the telecommunications industry, to head the Federal Communications Commission.
abstract: President Obama is expected to nominate Tom Wheeler as chairman of the Federal Communications Commission; Wheeler is a lobbyist and venture capitalist who has been a prominent fund-raiser in Obama's presidential campaigns; consumer advocacy groups have raised concerns about his background investing and lobbying for cable and wireless companies.
lead_paragraph: President Obama is expected to nominate Tom Wheeler, who has been a lobbyist and venture capitalist in the telecommunications industry, to head the Federal Communications Commission.

headline.seo: Obama Fund-Raiser Is Likely Pick to Lead F.C.C.
headline.main: Obama Ally Likely Pick for F.C.C.
headline.print_headline: Obama Ally Likely Pick For F.C.C.
